item.title: Mastering HTML templates in Go - The fundamentals
item.description: The main reason why we all like the Go programming language so much is because of its simplicity. And how else could the html/template parser be, than just simple.

item.title: How I build web frontends in Go
item.description: Go is a great language for building all kinds of backend services like APIs. But what about web frontends? Let’s have a look…
